> ...

>
Ok.
> By the way, do you know if someone have succesfully tested multiple
> Heritrix instances in the same JVM, running two or more parallel jobs?

static references -- but we've not tested extensively (You've  browsed 
to the '/local-instances.jsp' page?).

St.Ack
